x = []
for _ in range(int(input())):
    z = int(input())
    s1 = input()
    s2 = input()
    l = r = -1
    for i in range(z):
        if s1[i] == '*' or s2[i] == '*':
            if l == -1:
                l = i
            r = i
    (d1, d2) = (int(s2[l] == '*'), int(s1[l] == '*'))
    for i in range(l + 1, r + 1):
        d3 = min(d1 + 1 + int(s2[i] == '*'), d2 + 2)
        d4 = min(d2 + 1 + int(s1[i] == '*'), d1 + 2)
        (d1, d2) = (d3, d4)
    c = min(d1, d2)
    x.append(c)
[print(i) for i in x]
